mapper.select:
select * from ${commonSchema}common_sys_user
and (id like concat(#{id},'%') or id like concat(#{id},'%'))
and (user_name like concat(#{userName},'%') or user_name like concat(#{userName},'%'))
and (password like concat(#{password},'%') or password like concat(#{password},'%'))
and (real_name like concat(#{realName},'%') or real_name like concat(#{realName},'%'))
and (birthday like concat(#{birthday},'%') or birthday like concat(#{birthday},'%'))
and (email like concat(#{email},'%') or email like concat(#{email},'%'))
and (phone like concat(#{phone},'%') or phone like concat(#{phone},'%'))
and (memo like concat(#{memo},'%') or memo like concat(#{memo},'%'))
and (status like concat(#{status},'%') or status like concat(#{status},'%'))
and (operate_user_id like concat(#{operateUserId},'%') or operate_user_id like concat(#{operateUserId},'%'))
and (operate_date like concat(#{operateDate},'%') or operate_date like concat(#{operateDate},'%'))
order by id desc

select * from ${commonSchema}common_sys_user
and (id like concat(#{id},'%') or id like concat(#{id},'%'))
and (user_name like concat(#{userName},'%') or user_name like concat(#{userName},'%'))
and (password like concat(#{password},'%') or password like concat(#{password},'%'))
and (real_name like concat(#{realName},'%') or real_name like concat(#{realName},'%'))
and (birthday like concat(#{birthday},'%') or birthday like concat(#{birthday},'%'))
and (email like concat(#{email},'%') or email like concat(#{email},'%'))
and (phone like concat(#{phone},'%') or phone like concat(#{phone},'%'))
and (memo like concat(#{memo},'%') or memo like concat(#{memo},'%'))
and (status like concat(#{status},'%') or status like concat(#{status},'%'))
and (operate_user_id like concat(#{operateUserId},'%') or operate_user_id like concat(#{operateUserId},'%'))
and (operate_date like concat(#{operateDate},'%') or operate_date like concat(#{operateDate},'%'))
order by id asc
mapper.insert:
insert into ${commonSchema}common_sys_user
id,
user_name,
password,
real_name,
birthday,
email,
phone,
memo,
status,
operate_user_id,
operate_date,
#{id},
#{userName},
#{password},
#{realName},
#{birthday},
#{email},
#{phone},
#{memo},
#{status},
#{operateUserId},
#{operateDate},
mapper.update:
update ${commonSchema}common_sys_user
user_name=#{userName},
password=#{password},
real_name=#{realName},
birthday=#{birthday},
email=#{email},
phone=#{phone},
memo=#{memo},
status=#{status},
operate_user_id=#{operateUserId},
operate_date=#{operateDate},
where id=#{id}
